text: muttakbisakalaka yi jannatara pratisrauti diya haiche tara drstanta haiche, tata ache nirmala panira nijaraasamuha, arau ache gakhirara nadisamuha yara soraada aparaibartaniya, lagate panakarai sakalara babe ache susbadu suraara naharasamuha, arau ache paraisodhita maujolara nadisamuha arau tata thakiba te'omlokara babe pratyeka prakarara phalamula, arau ache te'omlokara pratipalakara taraphara paraa ksama. Te'omloka sihamtara darae neki yihamta jahannamata sthayi haâ€™ba arau yihamtaka pana karaoraa haâ€™ba utala pani, phalata se'i paniye sihamtara nari-bhurau chinna-bicchinna karai pelaba
